Module ACC Interface¶

class acc_interface.AccFactory(simulation_param, acc_vehicle_param)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

abstract acc_control(v_lead, v_acc, s_x_lead, s_x_acc, a_acc)[source]¶

Calculates the ACC vehicle input

Parameters

  • v_lead (float) – current velocity of leading vehicle [m/s]

  • v_acc (float) – current velocity of ACC vehicle [m/s]

  • s_x_lead (float) – x-position at the leading’s vehicle rear [m]

  • s_x_acc (float) – x-position at the ACC vehicle’s front [m]

  • a_acc (float) – current acceleration of the ACC vehicle [m/s²]

Return type

float

Returns

calculated acceleration [m/s²]

classmethod create(simulation_param, acc_vehicle_param, acc_param)[source]¶

Initializes desired ACC algorithm

Parameters

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – parameters of the simulation environment

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

  • acc_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with parameters of selected ACC controller

Returns

object of selected ACC controller
